job_details.Functieomschrijving:
To enhance the platform's functionality and user experience, we utilize the SPFX framework, Azure platform, Power Automate, PowerShell, and other tools. We aim to do this responsibly, ensuring our ever-expanding codebase remains scalable and maintainable, our team stays productive and innovative, and our platform remains future proof., We are seeking a Senior DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team. You will work closely with business analysts, implementation specialists, a product owner, solution architect, and -of course- other DevOps engineers to unlock the full potential of Microsoft 365., * Help the DevOps engineering team grow through your experience and insights.
     * Lay the foundation for a codebase that scales to 100+ solutions whilst remaining maintainable and productive for the team
     * Initiate quality-related improvements, propose and convince the team and business to invest in these areas
     * Oversee the entire application lifecycle of all building blocks (e.g., SPFX solutions and Azure Functions).
     * Explore new possibilities such as adaptive cards and generative AI.
     * Foster a constructive and responsible mindset within the development team.
     * Collaborate closely with the team rather than working in isolation.
job_details.full_text:
Senior DevOps Engineer - Microsoft 365 Specialist

To enhance the platform's functionality and user experience, we utilize the SPFX framework, Azure platform, Power Automate, PowerShell, and other tools. We aim to do this responsibly, ensuring our ever-expanding codebase remains scalable and maintainable, our team stays productive and innovative, and our platform remains future proof., We are seeking a Senior DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team. You will work closely with business analysts, implementation specialists, a product owner, solution architect, and -of course- other DevOps engineers to unlock the full potential of Microsoft 365., * Help the DevOps engineering team grow through your experience and insights.
     * Lay the foundation for a codebase that scales to 100+ solutions whilst remaining maintainable and productive for the team
     * Initiate quality-related improvements, propose and convince the team and business to invest in these areas
     * Oversee the entire application lifecycle of all building blocks (e.g., SPFX solutions and Azure Functions).
     * Explore new possibilities such as adaptive cards and generative AI.
     * Foster a constructive and responsible mindset within the development team.
     * Collaborate closely with the team rather than working in isolation.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Microsoft 365, Azure, and traditional DevOps practices, with only a brief mention of exploring generative AI. It lacks the core responsibilities and technologies associated with either an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Oversee the entire application lifecycle of all building blocks (e.g., SPFX solutions and Azure Functions).
Lay the foundation for a codebase that scales to 100+ solutions whilst remaining maintainable and productive for the team
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the management of the application lifecycle and the creation of scalable, maintainable codebases, which are core aspects of software development.

phrases: utilize the SPFX framework, Azure platform, Power Automate, PowerShell, and other tools.
our ever-expanding codebase remains scalable and maintainable
job_tasks.justification: The job title itself is 'DevOps Engineer', and the description mentions managing tools, ensuring scalability, maintainability, and future-proofing, all of which fall under operations engineering.

phrases: work closely with business analysts, implementation specialists, a product owner, solution architect
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a need to understand business needs and collaborate with various business-facing roles.

phrases: Explore new possibilities such as adaptive cards and generative AI.
job_tasks.justification: While not a core focus, the mention of 'generative AI' suggests some level of exploration or integration, which could touch upon modeling aspects.

phrases: work closely with business analysts, implementation specialists, a product owner, solution architect, and -of course- other DevOps engineers
Collaborate closely with the team rather than working in isolation.
Help the DevOps engineering team grow through your experience and insights.
Initiate quality-related improvements, propose and convince the team and business to invest in these areas
Explore new possibilities such as adaptive cards and generative AI.
Foster a constructive and responsible mindset within the development team.
Lay the foundation for a codebase that scales to 100+ solutions whilst remaining maintainable and productive for the team
Oversee the entire application lifecycle of all building blocks
